original: Reinhold Otto Mauritz, kontraktsprost, Norra Vi, f. 8/10/82 i Borgsjö, Västern. 1., av domprosten Otto W. o. Ingeborg Sandberg. G. 16 m. AHce Kindwall. Barn: Ulla f. 17, g. m. jur. kand. Bertil Henriques, Ingeborg 18, g. m. finmek. Holger Nielsen, Lars 22, merk. ing., Ann-So’fi 22, tj :m. i Riksförs :anst., g, m. jur. kand. Olle Björck. — Mogiex. i Luleå 03, teol. fil. ex. 05, teol, kand. C^, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Luleå stift 09. V. pastor i Karl Gustav 09, tf. kapellpred. i Tärendö 11-16, kyrkoh. där 16, i Norra Vi sed. 23, kontr :prost i Ydre kontr. sed. 2!5, i S. Vedboi kontr. sed. 43. Ordf. i kyrkostämma, folksk :styr., pastoratskyrkoråd o. Eksjö-kretsen av Allm. sv. prästfören. Var i Tärendö ordf. i bl. a. lok:styr. f. SvRK, Norrb. läns arbets-stugor o. pens :ndn. Skr.: art. i tidn. o. tidskr., spec. betr. språk- o. kulturfrågor i sv. finnbygden. LVO, SvRKSM. , Gerd Elisabeth Blume-, prakt, läkare, Göteborg, f. 29/6/06 i Lysekil av stadsläk. Riber Blume o. Elin Maria Högberg. G. 34 m. jur. kand. Carl Oswakl Westerberg. Barn: Helena Christina (Bitte) f. 36, Peter 37, Nicola 41. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 24, med. kand. i Upps. 29, med. Hc. v. Ka-rol. inst. 36. Assist :läk. v. Kronpr. Lo-visas vårdanst. somm. 35, friv. assist, v. Sabbats^bergs sjukh. o. Örebro las. med. avd. 36 o. 37, dito v. Gbgs barn-sjukh. 38 o. 39, v. Sahlgrenska sjukh. med. avd. II 42, skolläk. v. Gbgs folksk. sed. 42, egen prakt, i Gbg sed. 43. Led. av Gbgs teaterstyr., led. av styr. f. Gbgs h. samsk. Utg. ett ant. skr. i med. ämmen.
translated: Reinhold Otto Mauritz, rural dean, Norra Vi, b. 8/10/82 in Borgsjö, Västern. 1st child of the dean Otto W. and Ingeborg Sandberg. M. 16 with AHce Kindwall. Children: Ulla b. 17, m. to jur. cand. Bertil Henriques, Ingeborg b. 18, m. to finmek. Holger Nielsen, Lars b. 22, noted engineer, Ann-So’fi b. 22, working at the National Institute of Social Services, m. jur. cand. Olle Björck. — Completed exam in Luleå 03, theological philosophy exam in 05, theology degree C^, practical theological examination and ordination for the Luleå diocese in 09. Assistant pastor in Karl Gustav in 09, acting chaplain in Tärendö 11-16, parish priest there from 16, in Norra Vi since 23, rural dean in Ydre deanery since 2!5, in S. Vedboi deanery since 43. Chairman of the church council, public school board, parish church council, and the Eksjö district of the General Swedish Clergy Association. Was chairman in Tärendö for, among others, the local board for the Swedish Church, Norrbotten County's labor cottages, and pension fund. Wrote articles in newspapers and magazines, especially on language and cultural issues in the Swedish Finn community. LVO, SvRKSM. , Gerd Elisabeth Blume-, practicing doctor, Gothenburg, b. 29/6/06 in Lysekil to city doctor Riber Blume and Elin Maria Högberg. M. 34 with jur. cand. Carl Oswakl Westerberg. Children: Helena Christina (Bitte) b. 36, Peter b. 37, Nicola b. 41. — Passed the student exam in Gothenburg in 24, medical degree in Uppsala in 29, medical licentiate at Karolinska Institute in 36. Assistant doctor at Crown Princess Lovisa Hospital in the summer of 35, voluntary assistant at Sabbats^berg Hospital and Örebro County Hospital medical department in 36 and 37, the same at Gothenburg Children's Hospital in 38 and 39, at Sahlgrenska Hospital medical department II in 42, school doctor for Gothenburg public schools since 42, private practice in Gothenburg since 43. Member of Gothenburg Theater Board, member of the board for Gothenburg Higher Coeducational School. Published several works in medical subjects.

children.name: Ann-So’fi
children.description: Works at the National Institute of Social Services
